Title: Switch
Writer: Vince Gilligan (created by), Peter Gould (created by), Thomas Schnauz, Ann Cherkis (executive story editor), Gordon Smith (story editor)
Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn, Patrick Fabian
Plot: Jimmy decides to quit the law after turning down a job at Davis & Main. Mike breaks ties with a former associate.
